page.title: 05Transport
page.content:
In our area there are lots of cars and some motor bikes. We need cars in Christow and Bridford because the closest towns, Exeter and Newton Abbot, are about eleven miles away. We get a bus three of four times a day during the week but they carry few passengers because the fares are expensive. Most of the buses go to Exeter. The buses are useful for old people and children who do not own cars.
There is a taxi service to and from school if the children live a long way from the Primary School. Coaches take the senior school pupils to Teign School at Kingsteignton.
